price: (46) Or that He would not seize them during their [usual] activity, and they could not cause failure [i.e., escape from Him]?
arabic: أَوۡ يَأۡخُذَهُمۡ فِي تَقَلُّبِهِمۡ فَمَا هُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: aw yakhudhahum fī taqallubihim famā hum bimuʿ'jizīna
